physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Stamped on back of photograph: ''jack j. goldman, commercial photography, 1473 holly st. de. 3-8673, denver 20, colorado.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#406 B'nai B'rith 171.''

mods.abstract: A group of men and boys sit around the edges of a large room with a high ceiling and hard wood floors at the B'nai B'rith Building in Denver, Colorado. A man stands on one of three mats lying on the floor in the middle of the room.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
